display_long_description:
Congratulations, recruit — you’ve been accepted into Hero Bootcamp, the galaxy’s least predictable (and most eye-powered) superhero training program. Your goal? Survive the SHAT — the Super Hero Acumen Test — a whirlwind of ridiculous missions that somehow determine whether you're “hero material.”

[media]
Channel your inner champion as you fire Laser Eyes at malfunctioning equipment, telekinetically juggle dangerous objects, freeze time to avoid total catastrophe, and use X-Ray Vision to uncover whatever nonsense lurks behind the next wall. Every mission can be solved in multiple ways… including some we technically didn’t intend.

[media]

Designed as a fun, over-the-top showcase of eye-tracking on Meta Quest Pro*, Hero Bootcamp turns your gaze into your greatest weapon. Don’t have eye-tracking? Don’t sweat it — recruits on all Meta Quest headsets can still take the SHAT in full.

[media]

Put your eyes to work. Save the day. Try not to blow anything up. And remember: heroes aren’t born — they’re trained… questionably.
>
*Eye-tracking supported only on Meta Quest Pro.
